entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dome Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or wet flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to wet flurries after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Wet flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Wet flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
